results.title: Effects of simvastatin on activities of endogenous antioxidant enzymes and angiotensin-converting enzyme in rat myocardium with pressure-overload cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were given ig @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ 1.8 and 3.6 mg . kg-1 . d-1 for 8 weeks following 6 weeks @<m>DISEASE_Miosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015877 @@@aortic constriction@@@.
